content.rendered:
With respect to marketing, which is one of the strongest points not only for us, but also for all the ones that have any kind of job, manage, are challenged, but also have successes to show their work.

Public Relations and Marketing promoting study programs and the functioning of student services;

Through PR and marketing before the start of each new academic year, Tempulli organizes outreach meetings at High Schools of the Republic of Kosovo with the aim of informing and recruiting young students.
